entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
